vehicles.description: Orange utility vehicle with flashing lights and a warning sign, followed by a red truck on the right lane
vehicles.explanation: Both are moving slowly and partially obstructing the right lane, indicating potential road work ahead

traffic signs.description: Orange road work sign placed on the right side of the road before the utility vehicles
traffic signs.explanation: Indicates road work or maintenance in progress, signaling the driver to be cautious and potentially to merge into the left lane to avoid the obstruction

traffic cones.description: A series of orange and white traffic cones starting from the utility vehicle extending towards the road work sign
traffic cones.explanation: These cones demarcate the area of road work and suggest a lane closure ahead

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there is an orange utility vehicle with flashing lights and a warning sign, followed by a red truck on the right lane. Both vehicles are moving slowly and are partially obstructing the right lane, which indicates that there might be potential road work ahead. Additionally, there is an orange road work sign placed on the right side of the road before the utility vehicles. This sign indicates that road work or maintenance is in progress and signals the driver to be cautious. It also suggests that the driver should potentially merge into the left lane to avoid the obstruction. Furthermore, a series of orange and white traffic cones start from the utility vehicle and extend towards the road work sign. These cones demarcate the area of road work and suggest that there is a lane closure ahead. There are no vulnerable road users, traffic lights, barriers, or other objects present in the image.

3.description and explanation: This object is a traffic cone, typically used in road environments to signal caution and to reroute traffic flow. It usually features a bright orange color enhanced with reflective stripes, ensuring high visibility. For the ego car, this cone signaling possible construction or obstacles ahead, indicates the need to slow down or merge into another lane to maintain safe navigation and comply with road safety regulations.

driving_suggestion: The ego car should reduce speed and prepare to merge left if the right lane is closed ahead due to the road work. Maintain a safe distance from the utility vehicle and the truck in front.
